name: Welcome New Contact
subject: Welcome to {{company.name}}, {{contact.firstName}}!
content:
Welcome to our community!

Hi {{contact.firstName}},

Thank you for joining {{company.name}}! We're excited to have you as part of our growing community.

Here's what you can expect from us:

  • Regular updates on industry trends
  • Exclusive offers and discounts
  • Access to our knowledge base

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at {{user.email}}.

{{user.signature}}

name: Follow-up After Meeting
subject: Thank you for the meeting - Next steps for {{deal.title}}
content:
Hi {{contact.firstName}},

Thank you for taking the time to meet with us today. It was great discussing {{deal.title}} and understanding your needs better.

As promised, here's a summary of what we discussed:

  • Project timeline and milestones
  • Budget considerations
  • Implementation strategy

Our next steps:

  1. Prepare detailed proposal by {{date.tomorrow}}
  2. Schedule technical review meeting
  3. Provide cost breakdown

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can help clarify.

{{user.signature}}

name: Proposal Submission
subject: Proposal for {{deal.title}} - {{deal.value}}
content:
Dear {{contact.firstName}},

I'm pleased to submit our proposal for {{deal.title}}.

Project Overview:

Based on our discussions, we've prepared a comprehensive solution that addresses your specific requirements and business objectives.

Investment: {{deal.value}}

Timeline: We can begin implementation within two weeks of contract signing.

The attached proposal includes:

  • Detailed project scope
  • Implementation timeline
  • Pricing breakdown
  • Terms and conditions

I'm confident this solution will deliver the results you're looking for. I'd love to schedule a call to walk through the proposal and answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to your feedback!

{{user.signature}}

name: Meeting Invitation
subject: Let's schedule a meeting to discuss {{deal.title}}
content:
Hi {{contact.firstName}},

I hope this email finds you well. I'd like to schedule a meeting to discuss {{deal.title}} and explore how we can help {{company.name}} achieve its goals.

Proposed meeting agenda:

  • Understanding your current challenges
  • Exploring potential solutions
  • Discussing timeline and next steps

I have the following time slots available:

  • {{date.tomorrow}} at 2:00 PM
  • Next week Tuesday at 10:00 AM
  • Next week Thursday at 3:00 PM

Please let me know which time works best for you, or suggest alternative times if none of these work.

I'm looking forward to our conversation!

{{user.signature}}

name: Invoice Reminder
subject: Payment Reminder - Invoice {{deal.title}}
content:
Dear {{contact.firstName}},

I hope you're doing well. This is a friendly reminder that we have an outstanding invoice for {{deal.title}}.

Invoice Details:

  • Amount: {{deal.value}}
  • Due Date: {{date.today}}
  • Payment Terms: Net 30

If you've already processed this payment, please disregard this message. If you have any questions about the invoice or need to discuss payment arrangements, please don't hesitate to reach out.

You can make payment through the following methods:

  • Online payment portal
  • Bank transfer
  • Check payment

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

{{user.signature}}
